duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a commercial vehicle and haul feed from the mill to the farms.
Adhere to safety regulations and ensure zero accidents within the Dardanelle Complex.
Work flexible hours and complete required log book and dispatch.

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A CDL and clear satisfactory CDL record.
Must be at least 21 years of age.
Ability to lift 40 lbs and work in outside temperatures and environment.
Ability to sit for 8 to 10 hours a day and perform physical tasks such as grasping, gripping, twisting, pulling, bending, and stooping.
Must meet all Tyson and DOT driving specifications.
